featured.text: The Icelandic project, from which this pioneering procedure emerged, strives for making a fundamental change in the marine industry.
The Icelandic success is accomplished largely through cooperative efforts across various industries.
Petur Oddsson was an important member of the Icelandic project.

definition.en_def: Relating to Iceland or its language.
definition.example: I learned some Icelandic phrases before my trip to Reykjavik.
